attributes.action: End the £22billion subsidy paid to Scotland which divides our nation and is resented by the English taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scotland receives £1,500 per head MORE than England which provides free tuition fees for all students,free personal care & central heating installation for the elderly, free eye tests and soon dental checks, access to many drugs not available on the NHS in England & more. Also on the cards are free prescriptions & abolition of student top-up fees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
